name: Nova (Spocxy)
description:
Nova is a story based pixel art platformer in space. It somewhat folows the metroidvania style, but it's a little more linear than usual. The game takes about 15 minutes to complete and features a cool boss battle at the end.

The game can be downloaded as either a ZIP or Installer. Choose whichever you preffer. For the zipped verison make sure to extract it.

Nova was created for the GMTG Jam for block C 22/23.

Controls for the game

  1. "AD" - move left/right
  2. "SPACE" - Jump/Double jump (when unlocked)
  3. "SHIFT" - Dash (when unlocked)
  4. "LEFT MB" - Shooting (with cursor for flamethrower)
  5. "ESC" - Pause menu

The team:

Luc van Dijk (programming, design, some of the art, story, sound fx)

Abe Groothoff (banger music and sound fx)

Most of the assets like the tiles or player sprite are asset packs i've bought or were free to use. The game art is sort of a combination of asset packs and my own art.

this project took years of my life.
